column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Amazeballsss haha!! Let me just say that the food and sangria get 5 stars!! Their baked crab & shrimp dip made me cry it was so good. Of course I got their bacon wrapped dates
column2: that's a must. We had their seared Spanish sausages
column3: I'm not a big fan of meat but those were good. I'm giving it a 4 for one reason only:
